description.text:
A sorrowsoul can funnel his bardic powers to persevere in the face of seemingly certain death. At 5th level, a sorrowsoul can spend 3 rounds of his daily bardic performance as an immediate action to gain a +2 insight bonus on all saving throws for 1 round.
At 11th level, a sorrowsoul also gains spell resistance equal to 11 + his bard level when using this ability. At 17th level, a sorrowsoul also gains DR 10/-- when using this ability.
